name: Jane Hillston
content: Jane Hillston Jane Hillston's home page I am Professor of Quantitative Modelling in the School of Informatics within the College of Science and Engineering at the University of Edinburgh. I am a Fellow of the Royal Society, Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh and a Member of Academia Europaea. I am a member of the LFCS (Laboratory for Foundations of Computer Science) in the School of Informatics. In 2004 I was the recipient of the first Roger Needham award and in 2018 I received a Suffrage Science Award. In 2023 I was awarded an MBE in the King's Birthday Honours and the Lovelace Medal of the British Computer Society. recent publications recent presentations PEPA Bio-PEPA Jane Hillston (Jane.Hillston@ed.ac.uk) School of Informatics, Informatics Forum, 10 Crichton Street, University of Edinburgh, Edinburgh EH8 9AB, UK. (+44) 0131-650-5199
